Text: I'm sure this is great, but can we leave out the RAR files? The AVI is already compressed, and BT breaks it up into chunks anyway, so I don't understand the point of it (other than making me download a piece of software I don't want to uncompress it).

trixtah 

Well you have the alternativ to NOT download it!

Why complain? Upload yourself.....

ztrindberg, 
I'm not sure what this has to do with you, but yes, I seeded the un-rared avi on isohunt. I am just saying the uploader could save themselves  (and others) unnecessary hassle.

I am glad the file is available, though.
